meanings.definition: To revive or renew (a feeling or relationship)
meanings.sent1: After their argument, they are rekindling their friendship.
meanings.sent2: She is rekindling her love for painting after many years.
meanings.sent3: The siblings are rekindling their rivalry in a friendly game of chess.
meanings.sent4: His smile rekindled her hope in humanity.
meanings.sent5: The warm hug rekindled his sense of belonging.

meanings.definition: The act of reigniting a fire or flame.
meanings.sent1: The rekindling of the campfire brought warmth to the chilly night.
meanings.sent2: He watched the rekindling of the fireplace with fascination.
meanings.sent3: The rekindling of the bonfire lit up the dark forest.
meanings.sent4: The rekindling of the torch symbolized a new beginning.
meanings.sent5: The rekindling of the candles created a cozy atmosphere in the room.
